patthana1.19:1.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—paccuppannā hetū
patthana1.19:1.1_1: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.19:2.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ
patthana1.19:2.1_1: samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ …pe… paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā
patthana1.19:2.1_2: vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.19:2.1_3: phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.19:2.1_4: pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Atītaṁ cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati
patthana1.19:2.1_5: …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Atītaṁ sotaṁ …pe… ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde
patthana1.19:2.1_6: … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato
patthana1.19:2.1_7: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā
patthana1.19:2.1_8: … uddhaccaṁ … domanassaṁ uppajjati, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana1.19:2.1_9: paccayo. Ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Atītā
patthana1.19:3.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anāgataṁ cakkhuṁ
patthana1.19:3.1_1: …pe… vatthuṁ … anāgate khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Anāgatā khandhā
patthana1.19:3.1_2: iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:4.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannaṁ
patthana1.19:4.1_1: cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … paccuppanne
patthana1.19:4.1_2: khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya
patthana1.19:4.1_3: sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.19:4.1_4: …pe… paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:5.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ
patthana1.19:5.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā …pe… pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.19:5.1_2: jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.19:5.1_3: phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Atītaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe
patthana1.19:5.1_4: … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … atīte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ
patthana1.19:5.1_5: garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.19:6.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—anāgataṁ
patthana1.19:6.1_1: cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … anāgate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ
patthana1.19:7.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.19:7.1_2: khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana1.19:8.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītā
patthana1.19:8.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:8.1_2: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa
patthana1.19:8.1_3: … maggo phalassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa
patthana1.19:9.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.19:10.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.19:11.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.19:11.1_2: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ
patthana1.19:11.1_3: … maggaṁ … abhiññaṁ … samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Atītaṁ
patthana1.19:11.1_4: sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ upanissāya
patthana1.19:11.1_5: dānaṁ deti sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, pāṇaṁ hanati
patthana1.19:11.1_6: …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Atītā saddhā …pe… paññā, rāgo …pe… patthanā, kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ
patthana1.19:11.1_7: … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, rāgassa …pe… patthanāya
patthana1.19:12.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.19:12.1_2: … ghānasampadaṁ jivhāsampadaṁ … kāyasampadaṁ … vaṇṇasampadaṁ … saddasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ
patthana1.19:12.1_3: … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … patthayamāno …pe… anāgate khandhe patthayamāno
patthana1.19:12.1_4: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ … anāgatā cakkhusampadā …pe… vaṇṇasampadā
patthana1.19:12.1_5: …pe… phoṭṭhabbasampadā … anāgatā khandhā paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa
patthana1.19:12.1_6: sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:13.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.19:13.1_1: pakatūpanissayo …pe…. Pakatūpanissayo—paccuppannaṁ utuṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti,
patthana1.19:13.1_2: vipassanaṁ …pe… paccuppannaṁ bhojanaṁ senāsanaṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti …pe… samāpattiṁ
patthana1.19:13.1_3: uppādeti. Paccuppannaṁ utu … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya
patthana1.19:14.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.19:14.1_2: uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ
patthana1.19:15.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:16.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītā
patthana1.19:16.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:16.1_2: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa
patthana1.19:17.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—atītā cetanā paccuppannānaṁ vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:18.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannā cetanā
patthana1.19:18.1_1: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.19:18.1_2: paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:19.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko paccuppanno
patthana1.19:19.1_1: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.19:19.1_2: …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:20.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena
patthana1.19:20.1_1: paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.19:20.1_3: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.19:20.1_4: paccuppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, khandhā vatthussa
patthana1.19:20.1_5: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—cakkhāyatanaṁ
patthana1.19:20.1_6: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.19:20.1_7: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa
patthana1.19:21.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Uppannattike atthisadisaṁ.)
patthana1.19:22.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:23.1: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.19:24.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte
patthana1.19:24.1_1: aññamaññe nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane ekaṁ, kamme
patthana1.19:24.1_2: dve, vipāke āhāre ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.19:26.1: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:27.1: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:28.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.19:28.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.19:29.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi …pe… nasampayutte
patthana1.19:29.1_1: tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate
patthana1.19:31.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye …pe… nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.19:33.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe
patthana1.19:33.1_1: nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… kamme
patthana1.19:33.1_2: dve, vipāke ekaṁ (imesu padesu ekaṁyeva), avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
